issue.title: check-types function for `upon_error` and `upon_stopped` is wrong

discussion.p: The following has been reported by Trevor Gray:
In p5, the impls-for<decayed-typeof<then-cpo>>::check-types unction is specified as follows:

blockquote.pre: template<class Sndr, class... Env> static consteval void check-types();

blockquote.p: where unspecified-exception is a type derived from `exception`.

discussion.p: We can achieve that by replacing `set_value_t` in the problematic line with decayed-typeof<set-cpo>.

blockquote.pre: template<class Sndr, class... Env> static consteval void check-types();

blockquote.p: where unspecified-exception is a type derived from `exception`.
